quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: A people without the knowledge of their past history, origin and culture is like a tree without roots.
name: Marcus Garvey

quote: Knowledge will give you power, but character respect.
name: Bruce Lee

quote: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Human behavior flows from three main sources: desire, emotion, and knowledge.
name: Plato

quote: True friendship can afford true knowledge. It does not depend on darkness and ignorance.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: We are all born ignorant, but one must work hard to remain stupid.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.
name: Immanuel Kant

quote: The only source of knowledge is experience.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Knowledge is of no value unless you put it into practice.
name: Anton Chekhov

quote: Science is a way of thinking much more than it is a body of knowledge.
name: Carl Sagan

quote: Discussion is an exchange of knowledge; an argument an exchange of ignorance.
name: Robert Quillen

quote: It takes considerable knowledge just to realize the extent of your own ignorance.
name: Thomas Sowell

quote: The aim of education is the knowledge, not of facts, but of values.
name: William S. Burroughs

quote: Real knowledge is to know the extent of one's ignorance.
name: Confucius

quote: It is the supreme art of the teacher to awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens.
name: Jimi Hendrix

quote: The best advice I ever got was that knowledge is power and to keep reading.
name: David Bailey

quote: Research is creating new knowledge.
name: Neil Armstrong

quote: The art and science of asking questions is the source of all knowledge.
name: Thomas Berger

quote: The good life is one inspired by love and guided by knowledge.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: Ignorance is the curse of God; knowledge is the wing wherewith we fly to heaven.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: A good decision is based on knowledge and not on numbers.
name: Plato

quote: Liberty cannot be preserved without general knowledge among the people.
name: John Adams

quote: The doorstep to the temple of wisdom is a knowledge of our own ignorance.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Scientists have become the bearers of the torch of discovery in our quest for knowledge.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: Great teachers emanate out of knowledge, passion and compassion.
name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Opinion is the medium between knowledge and ignorance.
name: Plato

quote: A thorough knowledge of the Bible is worth more than a college education.
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: It is possible to fly without motors, but not without knowledge and skill.
name: Wilbur Wright

quote: True knowledge exists in knowing that you know nothing.
name: Socrates

quote: The greatest obstacle to discovery is not ignorance - it is the illusion of knowledge.
name: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: Risk comes from not knowing what you're doing.
name: Warren Buffett

quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Knowledge is power.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: Thought is the wind, knowledge the sail, and mankind the vessel.
name: Augustus Hare

quote: Beware of false knowledge; it is more dangerous than ignorance.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The one exclusive sign of thorough knowledge is the power of teaching.
name: Aristotle

quote: To acquire knowledge, one must study; but to acquire wisdom, one must observe.
name: Marilyn vos Savant

quote: For the things of this world cannot be made known without a knowledge of mathematics.
name: Roger Bacon

quote: I believe that through knowledge and discipline, financial peace is possible for all of us.
name: Dave Ramsey

quote: Some people drink from the fountain of knowledge, others just gargle.
name: Robert Anthony

quote: The goal of education is the advancement of knowledge and the dissemination of truth.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: The more knowledge you have, the greater will be your fear of Allah.
name: Abu Bakr

quote: Knowledge is proud that it knows so much; wisdom is humble that it knows no more.
name: William Cowper

quote: To know what you know and what you do not know, that is true knowledge.
name: Confucius

quote: The end of all knowledge should be service to others.
name: Cesar Chavez

quote: Knowledge is the eye of desire and can become the pilot of the soul.
name: Will Durant

quote: No man's knowledge here can go beyond his experience.
name: John Locke

quote: The gift of fantasy has meant more to me than my talent for absorbing positive knowledge.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Integrity without knowledge is weak and useless, and knowledge without integrity is dangerous and dreadful.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: The advancement and diffusion of knowledge is the only guardian of true liberty.
name: James Madison

quote: Where there is shouting, there is no true knowledge.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Without knowledge action is useless and knowledge without action is futile.
name: Abu Bakr

quote: I had rather excel others in the knowledge of what is excellent, than in the extent of my power and dominion.
name: Alexander the Great

quote: The only fence against the world is a thorough knowledge of it.
name: John Locke

quote: Knowledge is knowing that a tomato is a fruit. Wisdom is knowing not to put it in a fruit salad.
name: Brian O'Driscoll

quote: The interpretation of dreams is the royal road to a knowledge of the unconscious activities of the mind.
name: Sigmund Freud

quote: Knowledge is love and light and vision.
name: Helen Keller

quote: Those who have knowledge, don't predict. Those who predict, don't have knowledge.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: Knowledge has to be improved, challenged, and increased constantly, or it vanishes.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: The greater our knowledge increases the more our ignorance unfolds.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: If you have knowledge, let others light their candles in it.
name: Margaret Fuller

quote: My music is the spiritual expression of what I am - my faith, my knowledge, my being.
name: John Coltrane

quote: Knowledge is an unending adventure at the edge of uncertainty.
name: Jacob Bronowski

quote: It is beyond a doubt that all our knowledge begins with experience.
name: Immanuel Kant

quote: Information is not knowledge.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: To know, is to know that you know nothing. That is the meaning of true knowledge.
name: Socrates

quote: Grace is not part of consciousness; it is the amount of light in our souls, not knowledge nor reason.
name: Pope Francis

quote: Our knowledge is a receding mirage in an expanding desert of ignorance.
name: Will Durant

quote: The knowledge and insights you can get in just one day at a writers' conference make it worth the trip.
name: Tomi Adeyemi

quote: A little knowledge that acts is worth infinitely more than much knowledge that is idle.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: Knowledge rests not upon truth alone, but upon error also.
name: Carl Jung

quote: It is one of my sources of happiness never to desire a knowledge of other people's business.
name: Dolley Madison

quote: The natural desire of good men is knowledge.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Life is a travelling to the edge of knowledge, then a leap taken.
name: D. H. Lawrence

quote: All men by nature desire knowledge.
name: Aristotle

quote: Knowledge is true opinion.
name: Plato

quote: The great aim of education is not knowledge but action.
name: Herbert Spencer

quote: Wonder rather than doubt is the root of all knowledge.
name: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quote: I had therefore to remove knowledge, in order to make room for belief.
name: Immanuel Kant

quote: Devotion complete culminates in knowledge supreme.
name: Ramana Maharshi

quote: Technology is so much fun but we can drown in our technology. The fog of information can drive out knowledge.
name: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: Where is all the knowledge we lost with information?
name: T. S. Eliot

quote: The man of knowledge must be able not only to love his enemies but also to hate his friends.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Faith is a knowledge within the heart, beyond the reach of proof.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: Our knowledge is a little island in a great ocean of nonknowledge.
name: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quote: The saddest aspect of life right now is that science gathers knowledge faster than society gathers wisdom.
name: Isaac Asimov

quote: Reading furnishes the mind only with materials of knowledge; it is thinking that makes what we read ours.
name: John Locke

quote: We are drowning in information but starved for knowledge.
name: John Naisbitt

quote: A country without engineering skill and knowledge will never become a developed country.
name: Mahathir Mohamad

quote: The only real security that a man can have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience and ability.
name: Henry Ford

quote: They say a little knowledge is a dangerous thing, but it's not one half so bad as a lot of ignorance.
name: Terry Pratchett

quote: For my own part, I would rather excel in knowledge of the highest secrets of philosophy than in arms.
name: Alexander the Great

quote: The only good is knowledge, and the only evil is ignorance.
name: Herodotus

quote: Where all is but dream, reasoning and arguments are of no use, truth and knowledge nothing.
name: John Locke

quote: Fine art is knowledge made visible.
name: Gustave Courbet

quote: Knowledge of what is possible is the beginning of happiness.
name: George Santayana

quote: Ignorance is bold and knowledge reserved.
name: Thucydides

quote: I know of no time in human history where ignorance was better than knowledge.
name: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: Love takes up where knowledge leaves off.
name: Thomas Aquinas

quote: The true method of knowledge is experiment.
name: William Blake

quote: Thought is the wind and knowledge the sail.
name: David Hare

quote: Knowledge comes, but wisdom lingers.
name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: I would encourage you: be informed - knowledge is power.
name: Matt Bevin

quote: I prefer tongue-tied knowledge to ignorant loquacity.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Every addition to true knowledge is an addition to human power.
name: Horace Mann

quote: Having knowledge but lacking the power to express it clearly is no better than never having any ideas at all.
name: Pericles

quote: There's no such thing is aging, but maturing and knowledge. It's beautiful, I call that beauty.
name: Celine Dion

quote: All men are born with a nose and five fingers, but no one is born with a knowledge of God.
name: Voltaire

quote: Scientific knowledge is in perpetual evolution; it finds itself changed from one day to the next.
name: Jean Piaget

quote: Science is the knowledge of consequences, and dependence of one fact upon another.
name: Thomas Hobbes

quote: Scholastic learning and polemical divinity retarded the growth of all true knowledge.
name: David Hume

quote: The degree of one's emotions varies inversely with one's knowledge of the facts.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: Humility and knowledge in poor clothes excel pride and ignorance in costly attire.
name: William Penn

quote: There is no greater impediment to the advancement of knowledge than the ambiguity of words.
name: Thomas Reid

quote: As knowledge increases, wonder deepens.
name: Charles Morgan

quote: To know how to dissimulate is the knowledge of kings.
name: Cardinal Richelieu

quote: Anything that gives us new knowledge gives us an opportunity to be more rational.
name: Herbert A. Simon

quote: Hackers rarely have full knowledge of the technology stack of a target.
name: John McAfee

quote: In complete darkness, it is only knowledge and wisdom that separates us.
name: Janet Jackson

quote: The big value of the founder running the company is really two things: the knowledge and the commitment.
name: Ben Horowitz

quote: We must develop knowledge optimization initiatives to leverage our key learnings.
name: Scott Adams

quote: Wisdom is the power to put our time and our knowledge to the proper use.
name: Thomas J. Watson

quote: As a species we are always hungry for new knowledge.
name: Chaim Potok

quote: Knowledge once gained casts a light beyond its own immediate boundaries.
name: John Tyndall

quote: All wish to possess knowledge, but few, comparatively speaking, are willing to pay the price.
name: Juvenal

quote: Zeal will do more than knowledge.
name: William Hazlitt

quote: I had given up some youth for knowledge, but my gain was more valuable than the loss.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: To attain any assured knowledge about the soul is one of the most difficult things in the world.
name: Aristotle

quote: All our knowledge has its origins in our perceptions.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Wonder is the desire for knowledge.
name: Thomas Aquinas

quote: If knowledge can create problems, it is not through ignorance that we can solve them.
name: Isaac Asimov

quote: And what, Socrates, is the food of the soul? Surely, I said, knowledge is the food of the soul.
name: Plato

quote: Knowledge is the treasure of a wise man.
name: William Penn

quote: Today knowledge has power. It controls access to opportunity and advancement.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: The possession of knowledge does not kill the sense of wonder and mystery. There is always more mystery.
name: Anais Nin

quote: The knowledge from an enlightened person breaks on the hard rocks of ignorance.
name: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: We are here and it is now. Further than that, all human knowledge is moonshine.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: Anyone who has been successful and has knowledge to share is a potential mentor.
name: Ory Okolloh

quote: It is the province of knowledge to speak, and it is the privilege of wisdom to listen.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: The general knowledge of time on the island depends, curiously enough, on the direction of the wind.
name: John Millington Synge

quote: Knowledge which is divorced from justice, may be called cunning rather than wisdom.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Class is more than money. Class is also about knowledge.
name: bell hooks

quote: Human dignity is better served by embracing knowledge.
name: John Polanyi

quote: Knowledge of the sciences is so much smoke apart from the heavenly science of Christ.
name: John Calvin

quote: Pleasures take to themselves wings and fly away; true knowledge remains forever.
name: Dorothea Dix

quote: Henceforth the leaves of the tree of knowledge were for women, and for the healing of the nations.
name: Lucy Stone

quote: Knowledge has always flowed upwards to bishops and kings, not down to serfs and slaves.
name: Julian Assange

quote: The greatest enemy of progress is the illusion of knowledge.
name: John Young

quote: Knowledge shrinks as wisdom grows.
name: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: Knowledge without education is but armed injustice.
name: Horace

quote: If knowledge and foresight are too penetrating and deep, unify them with ease and sincerity.
name: Xun Kuang

quote: Knowledge is in the end based on acknowledgement.
name: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quote: Wisdom is a kind of knowledge. It is knowledge of the nature, career, and consequences of human values.
name: Sidney Hook

quote: The search for knowledge is a long and difficult task.
name: Fabiola Gianotti

quote: If we would have new knowledge, we must get a whole world of new questions.
name: Susanne Langer

quote: When a man's knowledge is not in order, the more of it he has the greater will be his confusion.
name: Herbert Spencer

quote: I believe in the power of ideas. I believe in the power of sharing knowledge.
name: Ory Okolloh

quote: I think we risk becoming the best informed society that has ever died of ignorance.
name: Ruben Blades

quote: Knowledge is soon changed, then lost in the mist, an echo half-heard.
name: Gene Wolfe

quote: The aim of education is the knowledge not of facts but of values.
name: William Inge

quote: Knowledge of what is does not open the door directly to what should be.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: There comes a time when the mind takes a higher plane of knowledge but can never prove how it got there.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Knowledge is knowing that we cannot know.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Perplexity is the beginning of knowledge.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: The larger the island of knowledge, the longer the shoreline of wonder.
name: Ralph W. Sockman

quote: There are in fact two things, science and opinion; the former begets knowledge, the later ignorance.
name: Hippocrates

quote: Knowledge without justice ought to be called cunning rather than wisdom.
name: Plato

quote: I and my colleagues here have been engaged in the pursuit of knowledge.
name: Frederick Sanger

quote: He who knows nothing is closer to the truth than he whose mind is filled with falsehoods and errors.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Knowledge becomes evil if the aim be not virtuous.
name: Plato

quote: Only on paper has humanity yet achieved glory, beauty, truth, knowledge, virtue, and abiding love.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: It is the knowledge that all men have weaknesses and that many have vices that makes government necessary.
name: James Monroe

quote: Knowledge cultivates your seeds and does not sow in your seeds.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: A writer of fiction is really... a congenital liar who invents from his own knowledge or that of other men.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Knowledge which is acquired under compulsion obtains no hold on the mind.
name: Plato

quote: Consider your origins: you were not made to live as brutes, but to follow virtue and knowledge.
name: Dante Alighieri

quote: A physician without a knowledge of Astrology has no right to call himself a physician.
name: Hippocrates

quote: But inner experience is only one source of human knowledge.
name: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: All knowledge of cultural reality, as may be seen, is always knowledge from particular points of view.
name: Max Weber

quote: It is now common knowledge that the average American gains 7 pounds between Thanksgiving and New Year's Day.
name: Marilu Henner

quote: Knowledge is power only if man knows what facts not to bother with.
name: Robert Staughton Lynd

quote: Sin, guilt, neurosis; they are one and the same, the fruit of the tree of knowledge.
name: Henry Miller

quote: Science is the father of knowledge, but opinion breeds ignorance.
name: Hippocrates

quote: What we want is to see the child in pursuit of knowledge, and not knowledge in pursuit of the child.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Knowledge is a polite word for dead but not buried imagination.
name: e. e. cummings

quote: No man can reveal to you nothing but that which already lies half-asleep in the dawning of your knowledge.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: But although all our knowledge begins with experience, it does not follow that it arises from experience.
name: Immanuel Kant

quote: Knowledge of the past and of the places of the earth is the ornament and food of the mind of man.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: The small part of ignorance that we arrange and classify we give the name of knowledge.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: There is much pleasure to be gained from useless knowledge.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: The price one pays for pursuing any profession, or calling, is an intimate knowledge of its ugly side.
name: James Baldwin

quote: We know accurately only when we know little, with knowledge doubt increases.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: The first step in a person's salvation is knowledge of their sin.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Take from the philosopher the pleasure of being heard and his desire for knowledge ceases.
name: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: You either have the charisma, the knowledge, the passion, the intelligence - or you don't.
name: Jon Gruden

quote: In your thirst for knowledge, be sure not to drown in all the information.
name: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quote: The knowledge of God is very far from the love of Him.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: It makes a great deal of difference whether one wills not to sin or has not the knowledge to sin.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: The desire of excessive power caused the angels to fall; the desire of knowledge caused men to fall.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: The great end of life is not knowledge but action.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: Our knowledge can only be finite, while our ignorance must necessarily be infinite.
name: Karl Popper

quote: All human knowledge takes the form of interpretation.
name: Walter Benjamin

quote: All the knowledge I possess everyone else can acquire, but my heart is all my own.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: The beginning of knowledge is the discovery of something we do not understand.
name: Frank Herbert

quote: To help, to continually help and share, that is the sum of all knowledge; that is the meaning of art.
name: Eleonora Duse

quote: Only divine love bestows the keys of knowledge.
name: Arthur Rimbaud

quote: A manager is responsible for the application and performance of knowledge.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: There is no substitute for accurate knowledge. Know yourself, know your business, know your men.
name: Lee Iacocca

quote: When we value correct principles, we have truth - a knowledge of things as they are.
name: Stephen Covey

quote: Doubt grows with knowledge.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: The world of knowledge takes a crazy turn when teachers themselves are taught to learn.
name: Bertolt Brecht

quote: Zeal without knowledge is fire without light.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: The greater the step forward in knowledge, the greater is the one taken backward in search of wisdom.
name: Stephen Gardiner

quote: It is no good to try to stop knowledge from going forward. Ignorance is never better than knowledge.
name: Enrico Fermi

quote: Ignorance is never better than knowledge.
name: Enrico Fermi

quote: I listened more than I studied... therefore little by little my knowledge and ability were developed.
name: Joseph Haydn

quote: This means that no single logic is strong enough to support the total construction of human knowledge.
name: Jean Piaget

quote: How dreadful knowledge of the truth can be when there's no help in the truth.
name: Sophocles

quote: The fundament upon which all our knowledge and learning rests is the inexplicable.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Knowledge of God's Word is a bulwark against deception, temptation, accusation, even persecution.
name: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: Knowledge is not skill. Knowledge plus ten thousand times is skill.
name: Shinichi Suzuki

quote: Wisdom is the knowledge of good and evil, not the strength to choose between the two.
name: John Cheever

quote: Never stop learning; knowledge doubles every fourteen months.
name: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quote: There is a general knowledge that I am multi-dimensional, that when you are creative you do a lot of things.
name: Suzanne Somers

quote: True knowledge lies in knowing how to live.
name: Baltasar Gracian

quote: Helping someone come to a saving knowledge of Christ is the greatest achievement possible.
name: Charles Stanley

quote: To be conscious that you are ignorant of the facts is a great step to knowledge.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: It is harder to conceal ignorance than to acquire knowledge.
name: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: Knowledge has value only insofar as it contributes to the all-round development of the whole nature of man.
name: Rudolf Steiner

quote: He that hath knowledge spareth his words.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: Knowledge and human power are synonymous.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: Science gives us knowledge, but only philosophy can give us wisdom.
name: Will Durant

quote: Thought must be divided against itself before it can come to any knowledge of itself.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: Technology requires knowledge and expertise more than it requires money.
name: Jonathan Raymond

quote: Scientific knowledge is a kind of discourse.
name: Jean-Francois Lyotard

quote: I think in the NFL knowledge is power, and you try to get the knowledge by whatever means.
name: Steve Sabol

quote: Epistemology is the study of knowledge. By what conduit do we know what we know?
name: Theodore Bikel

quote: Lack of knowledge... that is the problem.
name: W. Edwards Deming

quote: You should not ask questions without knowledge.
name: W. Edwards Deming

quote: If you understand physics of how a locomotive works, that knowledge is irreplaceable.
name: Jamie S. Miller

quote: To express the same idea in still another way, I think that human knowledge is essentially active.
name: Jean Piaget

quote: The recipe for perpetual ignorance is: Be satisfied with your opinions and content with your knowledge.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: We can be knowledgable with other men's knowledge but we cannot be wise with other men's wisdom.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: The will to do springs from the knowledge that we can do.
name: James Allen

quote: Where knowledge ends, religion begins.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: His ignorance was as remarkable as his knowledge.
name: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: If information and knowledge are central to democracy, they are conditions for development.
name: Kofi Annan

quote: I would rather excel in the knowledge of what is excellent, than in the extent of my power and possessions.
name: Plutarch

quote: Knowledge is of two kinds. We know a subject ourselves, or we know where we can find information upon it.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: Knowledge is recognition of something absent; it is a salutation, not an embrace.
name: George Santayana

quote: Knowledge is the most democratic source of power.
name: Alvin Toffler

quote: Knowledge slowly builds up what Ignorance in an hour pulls down.
name: George Eliot

quote: The knowledge of yourself will preserve you from vanity.
name: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: Knowledge is only one half. Faith is the other.
name: Novalis

quote: I'm one of those women who likes to chat and share knowledge and pass it around.
name: Jennie Garth

quote: The secret of improved plant breeding, apart from scientific knowledge, is love.
name: Luther Burbank

quote: Through the mythology of Einstein, the world blissfully regained the image of knowledge reduced to a formula.
name: Roland Barthes

quote: Can the knowledge deriving from reason even begin to compare with knowledge perceptible by sense?
name: Louis Aragon

quote: There's a period of life when we swallow a knowledge of ourselves and it becomes either good or sour inside.
name: Pearl Bailey

quote: The ability to perceive or think differently is more important than the knowledge gained.
name: David Bohm

quote: Distinguishing the signal from the noise requires both scientific knowledge and self-knowledge.
name: Nate Silver

quote: Education gives girls the knowledge, experience, and confidence to play their rightful role in society.
name: Tedros Adhanom

quote: Knowledge is power, if you know it about the right person.
name: Ethel Watts Mumford

quote: One of the greatest joys known to man is to take a flight into ignorance in search of knowledge.
name: Robert Staughton Lynd

quote: There is no desire more natural than the desire for knowledge.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Even knowledge has to be in the fashion, and where it is not, it is wise to affect ignorance.
name: Baltasar Gracian

quote: Nothing leads so straight to futility as literary ambitions without systematic knowledge.
name: H. G. Wells

quote: We are least open to precise knowledge concerning the things we are most vehement about.
name: Eric Hoffer

quote: Evil being the root of mystery, pain is the root of knowledge.
name: Simone Weil

quote: When a doctor does go wrong he is the first of criminals. He has nerve and he has knowledge.
name: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: I think India has several advantages in the knowledge sector, in the software sector.
name: N. R. Narayana Murthy

quote: We own almost all our knowledge not to those who have agreed but to those who have differed.
name: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: Wisdom comes from within. Knowledge is acquired and can sometimes put a screen on your wisdom.
name: A. R. Rahman

quote: Not ignorance, but ignorance of ignorance, is the death of knowledge.
name: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: Knowledge conquered by labor becomes a possession - a property entirely our own.
name: Samuel Smiles

quote: Cherish that which is within you, and shut off that which is without; for much knowledge is a curse.
name: Zhuangzi

quote: Knowledge is the prime need of the hour.
name: Mary McLeod Bethune

quote: A healthy vision of the future is not possible without an accurate knowledge of the past.
name: Daisaku Ikeda

quote: Science is organized knowledge.
name: Herbert Spencer

quote: Knowledge is very important and one of the few things that accompanies us into the next life.
name: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: Love is the intuitive knowledge of our hearts.
name: Marianne Williamson

quote: Knowledge is sometimes superfluous: when we need it, we have it not.
name: Saint Bernard

quote: I don't pretend we have all the answers. But the questions are certainly worth thinking about.
name: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: A loving heart is the beginning of all knowledge.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: I don't claim to know everything. I claim to be a seeker of knowledge.
name: Marie Osmond

quote: The best theology is rather a divine life than a divine knowledge.
name: Jeremy Taylor

quote: Knowledge may give weight, but accomplishments give lustre, and many more people see than weigh.
name: Herodotus

quote: I'm always trying to find brain food and indulge in knowledge that's gonna be useful.
name: Big Boi

quote: Useless knowledge can be made directly contributory to a force of sound and disinterested public opinion.
name: Albert J. Nock

quote: Wisdom we know is the knowledge of good and evil, not the strength to choose between the two.
name: John Cheever

quote: It is not ignorance but knowledge which is the mother of wonder.
name: Joseph Wood Krutch

quote: Knowledge is exploding, so you need to commit yourself to a plan for lifelong learning.
name: Don Tapscott

quote: The first step towards knowledge is to know that we are ignorant.
name: Richard Cecil

quote: The vast knowledge we have to prevent cancer, heart disease, and other chronic illnesses is staggering.
name: Tom Rath

quote: A broad base of knowledge is critically important to our ability to investigate terrorism.
name: Raymond Kelly

quote: Your aim will be knowledge and wisdom, not the reflected glamour of fame.
name: Abbott L. Lowell

quote: If we want our children to value education, then we must show our appreciation for knowledge.
name: Brad Sherman

quote: Poetic knowledge is born in the great silence of scientific knowledge.
name: Aime Cesaire

quote: It means that through knowledge have come responsibility and hope, and through both, action.
name: Edward Livingston

quote: The age we live in is a busy age; in which knowledge is rapidly advancing towards perfection.
name: Jeremy Bentham

quote: Let us democratise knowledge. Let us universalise justice. Together, let us globalise compassion!
name: Kailash Satyarthi

quote: Ardor, n. The quality that distinguishes love without knowledge.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Good nature is worth more than knowledge, more than money, more than honor, to the persons who possess it.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Knowledge is like money: the more he gets, the more he craves.
name: Josh Billings

quote: Knowledge, learning, is an eternal thing.
name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: To the best of my knowledge, none of the Beatles can read music.
name: George Harrison

quote: My mom took me to see Carnal Knowledge and The Wild Bunch and all these kind of movies when I was a kid.
name: Quentin Tarantino

quote: I had acquired the skills to sail a ship; I didn't acquire the knowledge.
name: Tom Holland

quote: The knowledge and spiritual conviction we receive from the Holy Ghost are the result of revelation.
name: David A. Bednar

quote: Knowledge is the life of the mind.
name: Abu Bakr

quote: The really frightening thing about middle age is the knowledge that you'll grow out of it.
name: Doris Day

quote: To the best of my knowledge, I'm the first mom to hold the job of the White House Press Secretary.
name: Sarah Huckabee Sanders

quote: In friendship as well as love, ignorance very often contributes more to our happiness than knowledge.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: A humble knowledge of thyself is a surer way to God than a deep search after learning.
name: Thomas a Kempis

quote: Knowledge is a process of piling up facts; wisdom lies in their simplification.
name: Martin H. Fischer

quote: Hope is the belief we might get it done, and faith is the knowledge we will get it done.
name: Tom Shadyac

quote: I read many things. I read to fill in my knowledge of the world.
name: V. S. Naipaul

quote: The greatest sin is judgment without knowledge.
name: Kelsey Grammer

quote: Knowledge is a beautiful thing, but there are a few things I wish I didn't know.
name: Susan Orlean

quote: The deductive method is the mode of using knowledge, and the inductive method the mode of acquiring it.
name: Henry Mayhew

quote: Knowing is the most profound kind of love, giving someone the gift of knowledge about yourself.
name: Marsha Norman

quote: My knowledge of video games ends with Nintendo 'Mario Bros.'
name: Gina Carano

quote: Democracy requires information. Plato knew that informed decision-making requires knowledge.
name: Mary Beard

quote: Wisdom is knowledge which has become a part of one's being.
name: Orison Swett Marden

quote: You have to have empathy, knowledge and compassion for your characters if you're a writer.
name: Paul Haggis

quote: I came literally to the table with a wealth of knowledge by simply understanding how food should taste.
name: Rocco DiSpirito

quote: Human knowledge is dark and uncertain; philosophy is dark, astrology is dark, and geometry is dark.
name: John Jewel

quote: Call a man 'ignorant,' and you have license to show the world your vast fund of knowledge and wise him up.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: In expanding the field of knowledge we but increase the horizon of ignorance.
name: Henry Miller

quote: Your knowledge of what is going on can only be superficial and relative.
name: William S. Burroughs

quote: That writer does the most who gives his reader the most knowledge and takes from him the least time.
name: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: A man of knowledge lives by acting, not by thinking about acting.
name: Carlos Castaneda

quote: Every great advance in natural knowledge has involved the absolute rejection of authority.
name: Thomas Huxley

quote: You move forward through knowledge. You prevail through knowledge. I love the word 'prevail.' Prevail!
name: James D. Watson

quote: You can practice to attain knowledge, but you can't practice to attain wisdom.
name: Herbie Hancock

quote: The desire of knowledge, like the thirst of riches, increases ever with the acquisition of it.
name: Laurence Sterne

quote: The knowledge I have now is not the knowledge I had then.
name: Stokely Carmichael

quote: Every job leaves its residue, a bit of extra knowledge, a new skill-set.
name: Joel Edgerton

quote: G is Grace, the Flaming Star is the Torch of Reason. Those who possess this knowledge are indeed Illuminati.
name: Adam Weishaupt

quote: That knowledge which is popular is not scientific.
name: Maria Mitchell

quote: I'll come to you with gifts of knowledge, wisdom and truth.
name: Barry White

quote: I think in most jobs, you get better as you get older. You gain experience, you gain knowledge.
name: Kristin Scott Thomas
